channel.description: Recent content in pickle on The Python Corner

item.title: Object Serialization in Python With the Pickle Module
item.description: DISCLAMER: There’s a newer (and probably better) article about this topic that I wrote for Real Python website. It’s longer and more detailed and it also have a section about the security concern when using the pickle module, so… I want to be honest and I suggest you to read that article … but if you like it, don’t forget to come back here and buy me a coffe! :)
